title: Which is this Serif Companion to Apex New?
content: Could somebody please name the companion font to Apex New as has been chosen for Emily Carr Institute? A picture can be found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065909/http:/vllg.com/system/usage_images/images/192/original/EmilyCarr4.gif?1259537851). Thank you.
author: tina

comments.content:
It must be **[Charter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065909/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=ITC&ffam=Charter%20ITC%20-%20Regular&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=88a88e9058a64bcf4a5467a3df784f64&wrap=2&text=The%20BC%20Provincial%20www.gov.bc.ca)** by Matthew Carter (1993).  
It's available as Charter ITC (ITC), Charter BT (Bitstream), Charter BT Pro (Bitstream) and once upon a time there was also an Charter EF version from Elsner+Flake. I think the original design owner was URW.

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106065909/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")

Good job Fivos.  
Charter was originally designed for Bitstream. In 1992 Bitstream donated the Charter font under terms that allowed modified versions of the font to be redistributed.
